title: The Adventures of Gil Blas of Santillane
description: binding: full red leather; blind and gold-stamped lettering and designs; raised spine (damaged in part); endpapers: marbled paper in tan, beige, blue, red and white; gilt-edged, pencil notations in front; 1021 pp. 4 vols.
creditline: Gift of the Estate of Dorothy Millett Lindeke
